page.title: 05FARM BUILDINGS CLOWNE
page.content: THE MORE MODERN BUILDINGS ON THE FARM INCLUDE A DUTCH BARN WHICH HAS 6 BAYS AND IS USED FOR STORING STRAW.THIS IS FOUND BEHIND THE OLD STONE BARN.BEHIND THIS ARE TWO MACHINERY SHEDS WHERE THE FARMER STORES SOMEOF HIS MACHINERY. THERE IS ALSO A SILAGE CLAMP WHERE THE FRESHLY CUT GRASS IS TURNED INTO SILAGE.THE MOST MODERN BUILDING IS THE CUBICLE HOUSE WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1980.THIS HAS ROOM FOR UP TO 80 CATTLE AND IS WHERE THE DAIRY COWS LIVE DURING THE COLD WINTER MONTHS.HE ALSO USES IT DURING SUMMER FOR STORING SOME MACHINERY MR.NICHOLSON HAS THREE TRACTORS AND A COMBINE HARVESTER.THE LATTER BEING USED FOR HARVESTING THE BARLEY.HE ALSO HAS A NUMBER OF TRAILERS,A PLOUGH,ROLLER,HARROWS,SEED DRILL AND MUCK SPREADER.
